entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow this morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
